recipes.label: Trade Stories at the Streets of Amsterdam
recipes.startdescription: Stories cling to the city like washlines over a street, or like fog on a window. If I engage with the locals, I can pluck Copenhagen's story and tell it as my own.
recipes.description: From the scullery maids, out in the markets for the shopping, I overhear this tale of the cleverness of one of their peers from fabled pasts.
